segments.text: Good morning , I ’ m Daniel . I ’ m applying for the positon of manager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Sit down , please . How did you learn about our company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got to know your company through such famous brands as LUX , LIPTON and WALLS . After making a customer survey , I was glad to find out how your products are appreciated by millions of Chinese .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why would you like to work with us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s the job I ’ m interested in . And your company is the best-known . Although I don ’ t have much experience as a manager , the job description you sent to me was very interesting . It ’ s a job I ’ Ve been dreaming of and I feel suited to fill it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , really ? Would you transfer to another company if it is not what you expected ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t think so . As the saying goes , A great oak needs deep roots . I ’ m really interested in this job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s fine . Thanks for coming to see us . I hope to be able to let you know about the job within the week .
segments.speaker: S2
